content: this throw is such a dream to both create and use instructions are provided within the pattern for how to create a throw exactly like the one pictured or customize the size/yarn choice and make it your own special thanks to hobbii for provided the yarn for this project and letting me try it out if you ever have any questions comments or suggestions for ways to improve my patterns please do not hesitate to email me thegracefultangle@gmail com dm me on instagram @thegracefultangle private message me on ravelry thegracefultangle or message me on etsy thegracefultangle also please feel free to sell any items you make using my patterns i simply ask that you link back to the pattern or put my information with your listing/tag on the item if you d like post what you make on instagram using the hashtag #thegracefultangledesigns thank you
